topic.topicDialog:
To make setting up your Student and Teacher accounts as easy as possible, you can import the data as a batch to Kerboodle.

There are three options for importing accounts - please choose the option which best applies to your School or College, depending on whether you use SIMS or Facility as your Management Information System.

step.stepTextTip: Once logged into Kerboodle, click on the Switch to Admin mode button at the top of the page and re-enter your password to enter the Admin area.

Follow the steps in the Import Wizard to import your student accounts. There are 3 options:

  • Import using the SIMS report
  • Import using the Facility report
  • Import using a blank template.
The Import Wizard will take you through the process step-by-step until you have successfully imported your student accounts.

The new accounts will then appear in the Students / Teachers list.

In order to assign courses and books to your students, the next step is to create a Teaching Group.
